virtues.name: Wisdom (Lady Wisdom)
virtues.kidFriendlyDefinition: Knowing the best thing to do and why it's right.
virtues.locationHint: Find her speaking in the Market of Proverbs.

virtues.name: Common Sense (Prudence)
virtues.kidFriendlyDefinition: Everyday good judgement — thinking before you act.
virtues.locationHint: Crossroads near the town gate — choose the safe path.

virtues.name: Understanding
virtues.kidFriendlyDefinition: Seeing what things mean and learning from them.
virtues.locationHint: The House of Scrolls (library) — solve the riddle of meaning.

virtues.name: Discernment
virtues.kidFriendlyDefinition: Knowing what is true and what is false about teaching.
virtues.locationHint: The council hall — test the claims you hear.

virtues.name: Hope
virtues.kidFriendlyDefinition: Trusting God’s promises and looking forward to good things from Him.
virtues.locationHint: The Hall of Promises — find the lamp of hope.

virtues.name: Stewardship
virtues.kidFriendlyDefinition: Caring for the world and the gifts God gives.
virtues.locationHint: The Kingdom Garden — tend the plants and learn to share.
